snippet.title: Dog Years Official Trailer
snippet.description:
On the verge of extinction and desperate for salvation, a dying civilization created a device that could manifest wormholes (portals) that lead to the far reaches of the universe.  Upon its creation and with no time to conduct tests, brave heroes volunteered to be the first to be sent through the portals. Accompanied by android dogs that serve as their companions, they swallow their fears and push through.

5P4RKY (codenamed “Sparky)” is one of the android dogs sent on the expedition. Upon traversing the portal, they wake up to an unfamiliar environment. At first glance, everything seemed to be a success. Until they realized that their master and the rest of the pioneer group were nowhere to be found.

Developer: Solitary Studios
Publisher:  Lamina Studios
Music: Nimroi  Garcia
